alert.note: Alert for Southeast Yuma County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 12:19PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Yuma County through 100 PM MST... At 1218 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles south of Wellton, or 25 miles southeast of Fortuna Foothills, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Yuma County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
